# Ricardo Dantas

> Software developer, guitar player, music maker

Personal website and blog of Ricardo Dantas, a software developer based in Stockholm, Sweden.

## About

Ricardo is a dad, software developer, and musician who writes about technology, life, music, and various topics. He creates open-source terminal tools built with Rust.

## Projects

### Terminal Tools (Rust)

**Feedo** - TUI RSS/Atom feed reader
- Website: https://feedo.ricardodantas.me
- GitHub: https://github.com/ricardodantas/feedo
- Install: `brew install ricardodantas/tap/feedo`

**Hazelnut** - Automated file organizer (inspired by Hazel)
- Website: https://hazelnut.ricardodantas.me
- GitHub: https://github.com/ricardodantas/hazelnut
- Install: `brew install ricardodantas/tap/hazelnut`

**Tickit** - Terminal task manager with CLI and TUI
- Website: https://tickit.ricardodantas.me
- GitHub: https://github.com/ricardodantas/tickit
- Install: `brew install ricardodantas/tap/tickit`

### Libraries

**ratatui-themes** - Color themes for Ratatui TUI apps
- GitHub: https://github.com/ricardodantas/ratatui-themes
- Crates.io: https://crates.io/crates/ratatui-themes

### Music

**DarkFrets** - Guitar covers and original compositions
- Social: https://ricardodantas.me/darkfrets

## Blog Topics

- Technology and software development
- Rust programming
- Terminal tools and TUI applications
- Music and guitar
- Life in Stockholm
